Visit one of these pages to obtain {{p}} observations data and metadata from the REST API for WOF written in Python:

The WaterML2 is valid, but is not fully imlemented. Known issues:

  • Fixed Metadata: QC Level: Raw Data
  • Fixed Metadata: Censor Code: Not Censored
  • No Value Metadata (Method Code, etc)
  • Unit of Measure may not be fully to best practice (using what is in ODM/dao model)
  • interpolationType title is from ODM/dao model, but referenece is fixed to xlink:href="http://www.opengis.net/def/timeseriesType/WaterML/2.0/Discontinuous"
  • GetValues?location={{p}}:{{s}}&variable={{p}}:{{v}}{% if u %}::{{ u }}{% endif %}{% if sm %}-{{ sm }}{% endif %} Note: May crash browser for large values sets.
  • GetValues?location={{p}}:{{s}}&variable={{p}}:{{v}}{% if u %}::{{ u }}{% endif %}{% if sm %}-{{ sm }}{% endif %}&startDate={{sd}}&endDate={{ed}}
